community_id.description: ID of a community to post in by default for this repo

lastPostUrl.description: URL of the last post made from this repo

appendix.description: Add this if you wish to remove or alter the default appendix to new threads. Ensure to use {{repoUrl}} in your appendix, as this will be replaced with the URL to your repo or file.

threads.description: Threads that are related to this repo. Will be picked up by the CLI to quote them when a new thread is desired.

slug.description: url-friendly human-readable identifier for this thread. Can be edited to make it easier to choose which thread to quote.

url.description: The URL of a thread to be quoted

branch.description: About which branch is this thread?

description.description: Optional: add some more info about this thread if useful

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss) of when this post was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss) of when this post was last commented upon
